text: Moro ʙa rohi rost hidojat kun: (Moro irşod va dalolat namo ʙa rohi mustaqim va tavfiq farmo va ʙar on ustuvor kun, to ʙa didori Tu muşarraf şavem. Va on roh Islom ast. Rohest, ki ʙandaro ʙa rizojati Alloh va çannataş meʙarad. Banda saodatmand nameşavad, to modome ki dar in roh mustaqim naʙoşad)
